   19: %%
   20: -module(error_logger_warn_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   23: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2,
   24: 	 init_per_testcase/2,end_per_testcase/2,
   25: 	 basic/1,warnings_info/1,warnings_errors/1,
   26: 	 rb_basic/1,rb_warnings_info/1,rb_warnings_errors/1,
   27: 	 rb_trunc/1,rb_utc/1,file_utc/1]).
   28: 
   29: %% Internal exports.
   30: -export([init/1,handle_event/2,handle_info/2,handle_call/2]).
   31: 
   32: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   33: 
   34: -define(EXPECT(Pattern),
   35: 	(fun() ->
   36: 		 receive
   37: 		     Pattern = X ->
   38: 			 erlang:display({got_expected,?MODULE,?LINE,X}),
   39: 			 ok
   40: 		 after 5000 ->
   41: 			 exit({timeout_in_expect,?MODULE,?LINE})
   42: 		 end
   43: 	 end)()).
   44: 
   45: 
   46: suite() ->
   47:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   48:      {timetrap,{minutes,1}}].
   49: 
   50: all() -> 
   51:     [basic, warnings_info, warnings_errors, rb_basic,
   52:      rb_warnings_info, rb_warnings_errors, rb_trunc,
   53:      rb_utc, file_utc].
   54: 
   55: groups() -> 
   56:     [].
   57: 
   58: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   59:     Config.
   60: 
   61: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   62:     ok.
   63: 
   64: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   65:     Config.
   66: 
   67: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   68:     Config.
   69: 
   70: 
   71: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   72:     Config.
   73: 
   74: end_per_testcase(_Case, _Config) ->
   75:     ok.
   76: 
   77: %% Tests basic error logger functionality.
   78: basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   79:     put(elw_config,Config),
   80:     basic().
   81: 
   82: %% Tests mapping warnings to info functionality.
   83: warnings_info(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   84:     put(elw_config,Config),
   85:     warnings_info().
   86: 
   87: %% Tests mapping warnings to errors functionality.
   88: warnings_errors(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   89:     put(elw_config,Config),
   90:     warnings_errors().
   91: 
   92: %% Tests basic rb functionality.
   93: rb_basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   94:     put(elw_config,Config),
   95:     rb_basic().
   96: 
   97: %% Tests warnings as info rb functionality.
   98: rb_warnings_info(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   99:     put(elw_config,Config),
  100:     rb_warnings_info().
  101: 
  102: %% Tests warnings as errors rb functionality.
  103: rb_warnings_errors(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  104:     put(elw_config,Config),
  105:     rb_warnings_errors().
  106: 
  107: %% Tests rb functionality on truncated data.
  108: rb_trunc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  109:     put(elw_config,Config),
  110:     rb_trunc().
  111: 
  112: %% Tests UTC mapping in rb (-sasl utc_log true).
  113: rb_utc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  114:     put(elw_config,Config),
  115:     rb_utc().
  116: 
  117: %% Tests UTC mapping in file logger (-stdlib utc_log true).
  118: file_utc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  119:     put(elw_config,Config),
  120:     file_utc().
  121: 
  122: 
  123: %% a small gen_event
  124: 
  125: init([Pid]) ->
  126:     {ok, Pid}.
  127: 
  128: handle_event(Event,Pid) ->
  129:     Pid ! {handle_event,Event},
  130:     {ok,Pid}.
  131: 
  132: handle_info(Unexpected,Pid) ->
  133:     Pid ! {unexpected_info,Unexpected},
  134:     {ok,Pid}.
  135: 
  136: handle_call(Unexpected, Pid) ->
  137:     Pid ! {unexpected_call, Unexpected},
  138:     {ok,Pid}.
  139: 
  140: start_node(Name,Args) ->
  141:     MyDir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
  142:     element(2,test_server:start_node(Name, slave, [{args, Args ++ " -pa " ++ MyDir}])).
  143: 
  144: stop_node(Name) ->
  145:     test_server:stop_node(Name).
  146: 
  147: install_relay(Node) ->
  148:     rpc:call(Node,error_logger,add_report_handler,[?MODULE,[self()]]).
  149: 
  150: 
  151: warning_map(Node) ->
  152:     rpc:call(Node,error_logger,warning_map,[]).
  153: 
  154: format(Node,A,B) ->
  155:     rpc:call(Node,error_logger,format,[A,B]).
  156: error_msg(Node,A,B) ->
  157:     rpc:call(Node,error_logger,error_msg,[A,B]).
  158: error_report(Node,B) ->
  159:     rpc:call(Node,error_logger,error_report,[B]).
  160: warning_msg(Node,A,B) ->
  161:     rpc:call(Node,error_logger,warning_msg,[A,B]).
  162: warning_report(Node,B) ->
  163:     rpc:call(Node,error_logger,warning_report,[B]).
  164: info_msg(Node,A,B) ->
  165:     rpc:call(Node,error_logger,info_msg,[A,B]).
  166: info_report(Node,B) ->
  167:     rpc:call(Node,error_logger,info_report,[B]).
  168: 
  169: nn() ->
  170:     error_logger_warn_suite_helper.
  171: 
  172: 
  173: 
  174:     
  175: basic() ->
  176:     Node = start_node(nn(),[]),
  177:     ok = install_relay(Node),
  178:     Self = self(),
  179:     GL = group_leader(),
  180:     warning = warning_map(Node),
  181:     format(Node,"~p~n",[Self]),
  182:     ?EXPECT({handle_event,{error,GL,{_,"~p~n",[Self]}}}),
  183:     error_msg(Node,"~p~n",[Self]),
  184:     ?EXPECT({handle_event,{error,GL,{_,"~p~n",[Self]}}}),
  185:     warning_msg(Node,"~p~n",[Self]),
  186:     ?EXPECT({handle_event,{warning_msg,GL,{_,"~p~n",[Self]}}}),
  187:     info_msg(Node,"~p~n",[Self]),
  188:     ?EXPECT({handle_event,{info_msg,GL,{_,"~p~n",[Self]}}}),
  189:     Report = [{self,Self},{gl,GL},make_ref()],
  190:     error_report(Node,Report),
  191:     ?EXPECT({handle_event,{error_report,GL,{_,std_error,Report}}}),
  192:     warning_report(Node,Report),
  193:     ?EXPECT({handle_event,{warning_report,GL,{_,std_warning,Report}}}),
  194:     info_report(Node,Report),
  195:     ?EXPECT({handle_event,{info_report,GL,{_,std_info,Report}}}),
  196:     stop_node(Node),
  197:     ok.
  198:     
  199: warnings_info() ->
  200:     Node = start_node(nn(),"+Wi"),
  201:     ok = install_relay(Node),
  202:     Self = self(),
  203:     GL = group_leader(),
  204:     info = warning_map(Node),
  205:     Report = [{self,Self},{gl,GL},make_ref()],
  206:     warning_msg(Node,"~p~n",[Self]),
  207:     ?EXPECT({handle_event,{info_msg,GL,{_,"~p~n",[Self]}}}),
  208:     warning_report(Node,Report),
  209:     ?EXPECT({handle_event,{info_report,GL,{_,std_info,Report}}}),
  210:     stop_node(Node),
  211:     ok.
  212: 
  213: warnings_errors() ->    
  214:     Node = start_node(nn(),"+We"),
  215:     ok = install_relay(Node),
  216:     Self = self(),
  217:     GL = group_leader(),
  218:     error = warning_map(Node),
  219:     Report = [{self,Self},{gl,GL},make_ref()],
  220:     warning_msg(Node,"~p~n",[Self]),
  221:     ?EXPECT({handle_event,{error,GL,{_,"~p~n",[Self]}}}),
  222:     warning_report(Node,Report),
  223:     ?EXPECT({handle_event,{error_report,GL,{_,std_error,Report}}}),
  224:     stop_node(Node),
  225:     ok.
  226: 
  227: %% RB...
  228: 
  229: quote(String) ->
  230:     case os:type() of
  231:         {win32,_} ->
  232:             "\\\""++String++"\\\"";
  233:         _ ->
  234:             "'\""++String++"\"'"
  235:     end.
  236: 
  237: iquote(String) ->
  238:     case os:type() of
  239:         {win32,_} ->
  240:             "\\\""++String++"\\\"";
  241:         _ ->
  242:             "\""++String++"\""
  243:     end.
  244: 
  245: oquote(String) ->
  246:     case os:type() of
  247:         {win32,_} ->
  248:             "\""++String++"\"";
  249:         _ ->
  250:             "'"++String++"'"
  251:     end.
  252:     
  253: 
  254: findstr(String,FileName) ->
  255:     File=binary_to_list(element(2,file:read_file(FileName))),
  256:     findstrc(String,File).
  257: 
  258: findstrc(String,File) ->
  259:     case string:str(File,String) of
  260:         N when is_integer(N),
  261:                N > 0 ->
  262:             S2 = lists:sublist(File,N,length(File)),
  263:             case string:str(S2,"\n") of
  264:                 0 ->
  265:                     1;
  266:                 M ->
  267:                     S3 = lists:sublist(S2,M,length(S2)),
  268:                     1 + findstrc(String,S3)
  269:             end;
  270:         _ ->
  271:             0
  272:     end.
  273: 
  274: %% Doesn't count empty lines
  275: lines(File) ->
  276:     length(
  277:       string:tokens(
  278: 	binary_to_list(
  279: 	  element(2,file:read_file(File))),
  280: 	"\n")).
  281: 
  282: %% Directories and filenames
  283: ld() ->
  284:     Config = get(elw_config),
  285:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  286:     filename:absname(PrivDir).
  287: 
  288: lf() ->
  289:     filename:join([ld(),"logfile.txt"]).
  290: rd() ->
  291:     Config = get(elw_config),
  292:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  293:     LogDir = filename:join(PrivDir,"log"),
  294:     file:make_dir(LogDir),
  295:     filename:absname(LogDir).
  296: rf() ->
  297:     filename:join([rd(),"1"]).
  298: 
  299: nice_stop_node(Name) ->
  300:     erlang:monitor_node(Name, true),
  301:     rpc:call(Name, init, stop, []),
  302:     receive
  303: 	{nodedown,Name} -> ok
  304:     end.
  305: 
  306: %% Clean out rd() before each report test in order to get only one file...
  307: clean_rd() ->
  308:     {ok,L} = file:list_dir(rd()),
  309:     lists:foreach(fun(F) ->
  310: 			  file:delete(F)
  311: 		  end,
  312: 		  [filename:append(rd(),X) || X <- L]),
  313:     ok.
  314: 
  315: fake_gl(Node,What,A) ->
  316:     Fun = fun() -> 
  317: 		   group_leader(self(),self()),
  318: 		   error_logger:What(A)
  319: 	   end,
  320:     rpc:call(Node,erlang,apply,[Fun,[]]).
  321: fake_gl(Node,What,A,B) ->
  322:     Fun = fun() -> 
  323: 		   group_leader(self(),self()),
  324: 		   error_logger:What(A,B)
  325: 	   end,
  326:     rpc:call(Node,erlang,apply,[Fun,[]]).
  327: 
  328: 
  329: one_rb_lines(Param) ->
  330:     file:delete(lf()),
  331:     rb:start_log(lf()),
  332:     apply(rb,show,Param),
  333:     rb:stop_log(),
  334:     lines(lf()).
  335: 
  336: one_rb_findstr(Param,String) ->
  337:     file:delete(lf()),
  338:     rb:start_log(lf()),
  339:     apply(rb,show,Param),
  340:     rb:stop_log(),
  341:     findstr(String,lf()).
  342: 
  343: %% Tests
  344: rb_basic() ->
  345:     clean_rd(),
  346:     %% Behold, the magic parameters to activate rb logging...
  347:     Node = start_node(nn(),"-boot start_sasl -sasl error_logger_mf_dir "++
  348:                       quote(rd())++" error_logger_mf_maxbytes 5000 "
  349:                       "error_logger_mf_maxfiles 5"),
  350:     Self = self(),
  351:     GL = group_leader(),
  352:     warning = warning_map(Node),
  353:     Report = [{self,Self},{gl,GL},make_ref()],
  354:     fake_gl(Node,warning_msg,"~p~n",[Self]),
  355:     fake_gl(Node,warning_report,Report),
  356:     nice_stop_node(Node),
  357:     application:start(sasl),
  358:     rb:start([{report_dir, rd()}]),
  359:     rb:list(),
  360:     true = (one_rb_lines([error]) =:= 0),
  361:     true = (one_rb_lines([error_report]) =:= 0),
  362:     0 = one_rb_findstr([error],pid_to_list(Self)),
  363:     0 = one_rb_findstr([error_report],pid_to_list(Self)),
  364:     1 = one_rb_findstr([warning_msg],pid_to_list(Self)),
  365:     1 = one_rb_findstr([warning_report],pid_to_list(Self)),
  366:     0 = one_rb_findstr([info_msg],pid_to_list(Self)),
  367:     0 = one_rb_findstr([info_report],pid_to_list(Self)),
  368:     2 = one_rb_findstr([],pid_to_list(Self)),
  369:     true = (one_rb_findstr([progress],"===") > 3),
  370:     rb:stop(),
  371:     application:stop(sasl),
  372:     stop_node(Node),
  373:     ok.
  374: 
  375: rb_warnings_info() ->
  376:     clean_rd(),
  377:     Node = start_node(nn(),"+W i -boot start_sasl -sasl error_logger_mf_dir "++
  378:                       quote(rd())++" error_logger_mf_maxbytes 5000 "
  379:                       "error_logger_mf_maxfiles 5"),
  380:     Self = self(),
  381:     GL = group_leader(),
  382:     info = warning_map(Node),
  383:     Report = [{self,Self},{gl,GL},make_ref()],
  384:     fake_gl(Node,warning_msg,"~p~n",[Self]),
  385:     fake_gl(Node,warning_report,Report),
  386:     nice_stop_node(Node),
  387:     application:start(sasl),
  388:     rb:start([{report_dir, rd()}]),
  389:     rb:list(),
  390:     true = (one_rb_lines([error]) =:= 0),
  391:     true = (one_rb_lines([error_report]) =:= 0),
  392:     0 = one_rb_findstr([error],pid_to_list(Self)),
  393:     0 = one_rb_findstr([error_report],pid_to_list(Self)),
  394:     0 = one_rb_findstr([warning_msg],pid_to_list(Self)),
  395:     0 = one_rb_findstr([warning_report],pid_to_list(Self)),
  396:     1 = one_rb_findstr([info_msg],pid_to_list(Self)),
  397:     1 = one_rb_findstr([info_report],pid_to_list(Self)),
  398:     2 = one_rb_findstr([],pid_to_list(Self)),
  399:     true = (one_rb_findstr([progress],"===") > 3),
  400:     rb:stop(),
  401:     application:stop(sasl),
  402:     stop_node(Node),
  403:     ok.
  404: 
  405: rb_warnings_errors() ->
  406:     clean_rd(),
  407:     Node = start_node(nn(),"+W e -boot start_sasl -sasl error_logger_mf_dir "++
  408:                       quote(rd())++" error_logger_mf_maxbytes 5000 "
  409:                       "error_logger_mf_maxfiles 5"),
  410:     Self = self(),
  411:     GL = group_leader(),
  412:     error = warning_map(Node),
  413:     Report = [{self,Self},{gl,GL},make_ref()],
  414:     fake_gl(Node,warning_msg,"~p~n",[Self]),
  415:     fake_gl(Node,warning_report,Report),
  416:     nice_stop_node(Node),
  417:     application:start(sasl),
  418:     rb:start([{report_dir, rd()}]),
  419:     rb:list(),
  420:     true = (one_rb_lines([error]) > 1),
  421:     true = (one_rb_lines([error_report]) > 1),
  422:     1 = one_rb_findstr([error],pid_to_list(Self)),
  423:     1 = one_rb_findstr([error_report],pid_to_list(Self)),
  424:     0 = one_rb_findstr([warning_msg],pid_to_list(Self)),
  425:     0 = one_rb_findstr([warning_report],pid_to_list(Self)),
  426:     0 = one_rb_findstr([info_msg],pid_to_list(Self)),
  427:     0 = one_rb_findstr([info_report],pid_to_list(Self)),
  428:     2 = one_rb_findstr([],pid_to_list(Self)),
  429:     true = (one_rb_findstr([progress],"===") > 3),
  430:     rb:stop(),
  431:     application:stop(sasl),
  432:     stop_node(Node),
  433:     ok.
  434: 
  435: rb_trunc() ->
  436:     clean_rd(),
  437:     Node = start_node(nn(),"-boot start_sasl -sasl error_logger_mf_dir "++
  438:                       quote(rd())++" error_logger_mf_maxbytes 5000 "
  439:                       "error_logger_mf_maxfiles 5"),
  440:     Self = self(),
  441:     GL = group_leader(),
  442:     Report = [{self,Self},{gl,GL},make_ref()],
  443:     fake_gl(Node,warning_msg,"~p~n",[Self]),
  444:     fake_gl(Node,warning_report,Report),
  445:     nice_stop_node(Node),
  446:     application:start(sasl),
  447:     {ok,File} = file:read_file(rf()),
  448:     S=byte_size(File)-2,
  449:     <<TFile:S/binary,_/binary>>=File,
  450:     file:write_file(rf(),TFile),
  451:     rb:start([{report_dir, rd()}]),
  452:     rb:list(),
  453:     true = (one_rb_lines([error]) =:= 0),
  454:     true = (one_rb_lines([error_report]) =:= 0),
  455:     0 = one_rb_findstr([error],pid_to_list(Self)),
  456:     0 = one_rb_findstr([error_report],pid_to_list(Self)),
  457:     1 = one_rb_findstr([warning_msg],pid_to_list(Self)),
  458:     0 = one_rb_findstr([warning_report],pid_to_list(Self)),
  459:     0 = one_rb_findstr([info_msg],pid_to_list(Self)),
  460:     0 = one_rb_findstr([info_report],pid_to_list(Self)),
  461:     1 = one_rb_findstr([],pid_to_list(Self)),
  462:     true = (one_rb_findstr([progress],"===") > 3),
  463:     rb:stop(),
  464:     application:stop(sasl),
  465:     stop_node(Node),
  466:     ok.
  467: 
  468: rb_utc() ->
  469:     clean_rd(),
  470:     Node = start_node(nn(),"-boot start_sasl -sasl error_logger_mf_dir "++
  471:                       quote(rd())++" error_logger_mf_maxbytes 5000 "
  472:                       "error_logger_mf_maxfiles 5 -sasl utc_log true"),
  473:     Self = self(),
  474:     GL = group_leader(),
  475:     Report = [{self,Self},{gl,GL},make_ref()],
  476:     fake_gl(Node,warning_msg,"~p~n",[Self]),
  477:     fake_gl(Node,warning_report,Report),
  478:     nice_stop_node(Node),
  479:     application:stop(sasl),
  480:     UtcLog=case application:get_env(sasl,utc_log) of
  481:                {ok,true} ->
  482:                    true;
  483:                {ok,false} ->
  484:                    application:set_env(sasl,utc_log,true),
  485:                    false;
  486:                undefined ->
  487:                    application:set_env(sasl,utc_log,true),
  488:                    undefined
  489:            end,
  490:     application:start(sasl),
  491:     rb:start([{report_dir, rd()}]),
  492:     rb:list(),
  493:     Pr=one_rb_findstr([progress],"==="),
  494:     Wm=one_rb_findstr([warning_msg],"==="),
  495:     Wr=one_rb_findstr([warning_report],"==="),
  496:     Sum=Pr+Wm+Wr,
  497:     Sum=one_rb_findstr([],"UTC"),
  498:     rb:stop(),
  499:     application:stop(sasl),
  500:     case UtcLog of
  501:         undefined ->
  502:             application:unset_env(sasl,utc_log);
  503:         _ ->
  504:             application:set_env(sasl,utc_log,UtcLog)
  505:     end,
  506:     stop_node(Node),
  507:     ok.
  508:     
  509: file_utc() ->
  510:     file:delete(lf()),
  511:     SS="-stdlib utc_log true -kernel error_logger "++ oquote("{file,"++iquote(lf())++"}"),
  512:     Node = start_node(nn(),SS),
  513:     Self = self(),
  514:     GL = group_leader(),
  515:     fake_gl(Node,error_msg,"~p~n",[Self]),
  516:     fake_gl(Node,warning_msg,"~p~n",[Self]),
  517:     fake_gl(Node,info_msg,"~p~n",[Self]),
  518:     Report = [{self,Self},{gl,GL},make_ref()],
  519:     fake_gl(Node,error_report,Report),
  520:     fake_gl(Node,warning_report,Report),
  521:     fake_gl(Node,info_report,Report),
  522:     nice_stop_node(Node),
  523:     receive after 5000 -> ok end, % Let the node die, needed
  524:     6 = findstr("UTC",lf()),
  525:     2 = findstr("WARNING",lf()),
  526:     2 = findstr("ERROR",lf()),
  527:     2 = findstr("INFO",lf()),
  528:     stop_node(Node),
  529:     ok.
